title: Signed out vs. signed in
description: Template addressing how VA.gov displays different content based on user authentication status.

frontMatter.title: Signed out vs. signed in
frontMatter.description: Template addressing how VA.gov displays different content based on user authentication status.
frontMatter.intro: This template addresses how VA.gov displays different content, features, and CTAs depending on user authentication status. When unsigned, minimal information is shown; upon sign-in and identity verification, personalized content appears.

when_to_use.value: **Pages with VA benefits or services.** Any page offering VA benefits or services.
**Applications requiring authentication.** Forms that need user identity.
**Conditional features.** Pages with features based on login status.
**User-dependent options.** When user information affects available options.

structure.intro: The template covers site header and contextual CTA variations based on authentication state.

sections.title: Site Header - Large screens (signed out)
sections.description: Standard Sign In button in header. Navigation without personalization.

sections.title: Site Header - Large screens (signed in)
sections.description: User's first name replaces Sign In button. 'My VA' and 'My Health' added to top navigation.

sections.title: Site Header - Small screens (signed out)
sections.description: Menu-based navigation. Standard Sign In link.

sections.title: Site Header - Small screens (signed in)
sections.description: User's first name displayed. 'My VA' and 'My Health' options in expandable menu.

sections.title: CTA Required to Continue (Green Alert)
sections.description: Signed out: 'Create account' messaging. Signed in: 'Verify identity' messaging.

sections.title: CTA Beneficial, Not Required (Blue Alert)
sections.description: Encourages sign-in as primary action. Non-blocking, informational approach.

sections.title: Error State (Red Alert)
sections.description: Blocks process continuation. Always provides resolution path.

content_guidelines.value: Provide clear next steps for each state.
Distinguish between required and recommended actions.
Use appropriate alert colors: green for required, blue for beneficial, red for errors.

accessibility.value: Proper focus management in navigation state changes.
Alert role semantics for status messages.
Screen reader considerations for conditional content.
Keyboard navigation support for all interactive elements.
